1. Zuckerberg Seems Genuinely Alarmed by the Explosive Growth of Bluesky  Futurism

item.title: Trump’s tariff plan is an inflation plan - Vox.com
item.description:
1. Trump’s tariff plan is an inflation plan  Vox.com
